Text:
Rejoice, windows 7 64bit users! This is the FULL 
game!
For some reason it doesnt save your progress, is there anyway to fix this? I think that it might be that this game saves onto the steam cloud client... anyone know how to get around this?
@ Blackstar117......works fine and saves and continues. just run as administrator ie right click on the icon, properties, compatibily and check the run as administrator...that stuff.

Thanks, rolexy1234567890! I could not figure
out why the game would never save. Your 
solution works perfectly!
